name: Makeup Star-Fashion Stylist
description:
Welcome, makeup superstars！I bet this makeup game will be one of your favorites.

It’s time to show us your amazing makeup talents. Come try these fabulous makeup looks. Eyebrow designs, eye shadow, lips, hairstyles, etc., we have it all! Receiving “Likes” from fans and be a Makeup Star here. You can even decorate your dressing room to make it unique.

So what are you waiting for? Let’s do it!
